VoucherDefinition.name: VoucherDefinition
VoucherDefinition.description: Represents details about a voucher definition thatâ€™s associated with a loyalty program.

AutogeneratedCodeLength.description: The length of the auto-generated voucher code. If no value is specified, the default is eight digits. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

CodePrefix.description: The prefix of the auto-generated voucher code. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

CodeSuffix.description: The suffix of the auto-generated voucher code. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

CostPerVoucher.description: The liability incurred for each voucher that's issued. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

DiscountPercent.description: The discount percentage associated with the voucher.

EffectiveDate.description: Required. The date on which the voucher becomes valid.

EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time from when the vouchers issued by the voucher definition can be redeemed by customers. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ExpirationDate.description: The date the voucher expires. The expiration date is only valid for the fixed date model.

ExpirationDateTime.description: The date and time on which the vouchers issued by the voucher definition are no longer available for customers to redeem. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ExpirationPeriod.description: The number of days or months in the expiration period.

ExpirationPeriodUnit.description: The unit for the expiration period.

ExpirationType.description: Required. The type of expiration for the voucher.

HasTimeBasedVoucherPeriod.description: Indicates whether vouchers issued using the definition are effective and expire at a specific date and time. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

ImageUrl.description: The URL for the voucher definition image. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

IsActive.description: Required. Indicates whether the voucher is active (true) or not (false).

IsPartialRedeemable.description: Indicates whether the voucher can be partially redeemed (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 53.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The ID of the loyalty program.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PartnerAccountId.description: The partner associated with the voucher.

ProductCategoryDerivedFieldId.description: A look up to show product category in voucher definition.

ProductDerivedFieldId.description: A look up to show product in voucher definition.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the voucher.
